definitions.body: crafty, ´[[ע]] as pred., of serpent Ge 3:1; pl. as subst. [[מַחְשְׁבוֹת עֲרוּמִים]] Job 5:12, ´[[לְשׁוֹן ע]] Job 15:5.

in Pr, in good sense (opp. [[אֱוִיל]], [[כְּסִיל]], [[פֶּתִי]]); as attrib. [[אָדָם עָרוּם]] Pr 12:23 a shrewd or sensible man; ´[[ע]] as subst. = id., v:Pr 12:16, Pr 13:16, so ´[[חָכְמַת ע]] v:Pr 13:8; = prudent man Pr 14:15, Pr 22:3, Pr 27:12; pl. [[עֲרוּמִים]] Pr 14:18.
